p: Zingiber Mill. is a species-rich genus within the subfamily Zingireroideae of Zingiberaceae, which are native to Southeast Asia [ 20]. The Plant List currently has 146 accepted names for Zingiber species [ 21]. The phytochemistry, particularly essential oil chemistry, and the pharmacology of Zingiber have been reviewed [ 22]. Currently, at least thirty-six species of Zingiber have been reported in Vietnam [ 23, 24, 25].
